verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] trying to render Congress irrelevant on matters of war and peace . That would be a big mistake .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: trying] [ARG1: to render Congress irrelevant on matters of war and peace] . That would be a big mistake .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is trying to [V: render] [ARG1: Congress] [ARG2: irrelevant on matters of war and peace] . That would be a big mistake .
The Trump administration is trying to render Congress irrelevant on matters of war and peace . That [V: would] be a big mistake .
The Trump administration is trying to render Congress irrelevant on matters of war and peace . [ARG1: That] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: be] [ARG2: a big mistake] .
